screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .vmix file in StudioCoast vMix 24
screenshot.caption: VMIX file open in StudioCoast vMix 24

description: vMix is a professional video broadcast application that allows you to stream videos to various platforms, such as YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, and Twitter. The VMIX file type enables you to save your settings for a broadcast to preserve how your video appears and how it is delivered.

To create a VMIX file with vMix, select New , choose the video format, click OK , then select Save . After saving the VMIX file, you can close it, then re-open it at a later time for further editing, or to begin another broadcast.
